verbose_text: XREF_BIBR) Takeda in our laboratory demonstrated in 1993 that transfection of the PIGA cDNA restored GPI-AP expression on these PNH cells, that the affected B-lymphoblastoid cells and affected granulocytes, but not wild-type B-lymphoblastoid cells from the same patients, had PIGA mutations, and that the PIGA gene is X linked.
